title.rendered: Start Smart! Vet Your Trademarks with Litwin Law

content.rendered:
We’ve all been there: you identify the perfect name, craft clever copy, develop a dazzling visual system, and deliver it all to your client. A few weeks later, the bad news arrives: it’s taken. We can’t use it. Start from scratch.

Enter Litwin Law. We offer efficient, flat-fee trademark screening services to creative agencies in the business of brands. Whether you design names, logos, taglines, or any other elements of identity for your clients, making sure that your work is ownable is crucial to success. The right time to do this is early on, as part of the same strategic process you use to winnow down early lists to compelling finalists – before your clients acquire the domain name, paint the walls, print the business cards, buy the swag, produce the goods, and build goodwill with their consumers.

We maximize your time and budgets to focus on the most viable names, taglines, and logos. Let us support your branding and naming projects by constructing and analyzing comprehensive trademark search reports. We give you and your clients the answers you need, in plain English, so you can focus on what you do best.

Curious how we can help you to start smart? Please visit our website or e-mail practice leader Perry Gattegno.

This post is Attorney Advertising by Litwin Law, LLC, 332 S Michigan, Suite 1100, Chicago, IL 60604.
